author: Aeroverra
name: Stream Deck Plugin
description: A template for creating a Stream Deck plugin for Mac / Windows using the Aerove Stream Deck Client.

Plugins Path.description: The path to your Stream Deck plugins folder

Author.description: The author of the plugin. This string is displayed to the user in the Stream Deck store.

Category.description: The name of the custom category in which the actions should be listed. This string is visible to the user in the actions list. If you don't provide a category, the actions will appear inside a 'Custom' category.

Description.description: Provides a general description of what the plugin does. This string is displayed to the user in the Stream Deck store.

Plugin Name.description: The name of the plugin. This string is displayed to the user in the Stream Deck store.

Action Name Min.description: Action name with no spaces or special symbols

URL.description: A site to provide more information about the plugin.

Action Name.description: The name of your first action. This string is visible to the user in the actions list.

Action Tooltip.description: The string is displayed as a tooltip when the user leaves the mouse over your action in the actions list.
